loadByName.sql: select * from user where username like {username}

update.sql: update user set username={username}, password={password} where id={id}

page.sql: select * from user <%if({{username}}) return 'where username like #{username}'%> <%if({{sort}}) return 'order by id ${order}'%> <%if({{pageSize}}) return 'limit #{pageOffset}, #{pageSize}'%>
